head.title: Paid Notice: Memorials BUTLER, MICHAEL DOMENICK

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Memorials BUTLER, MICHAEL DOMENICK

block.p: BUTLER--Michael Domenick left this earth on March 29, 2006, at the age of 43 years because of lung cancer. My beloved son, my bright and precious angel, with such generosity of spirit, rest in peace. You will live in my heart forever. I love you, miss you, and you are always in my thoughts every day and every night. You have left a void that can never be filled. To all who read this, from a heartbroken Mother, I beg you, ''DON'T SMOKE''. Marie Katerina
